climatePledgeFriendly.details: Cradle to Cradle Certified products are made with safer materials and responsible processes to positively impact people and our planet. SILVER ACHIEVEMENT LEVEL

features: [ ACNE FACE WASH WITH BENZOYL PEROXIDE ] This benzoyl peroxide face wash helps clear acne, pimples, whiteheads, and blackheads from skin's surface and helps prevent new acne from forming & allows skin to heal. This product is non-sealed.

[ CREAM CLEANSER TO FOAMING CLEANSER ] This CeraVe face wash dispenses and applies as a soothing & creamy texture and transforms into a foam as you lather into skin. Gently remove dirt and excess oil without leaving skin feeling stripped of moisture
[ HYDRATING ACNE WASH ] Formulated with hyaluronic Acid to help retain skin's natural moisture and niacinamide to help calm skin. Fragrance free and non-comedogenic

[ 3 ESSENTIAL CERAMIDES ] Ceramides are found naturally in the skin and make up 50% of the lipids in the skin barrier. All CeraVe products, formulated with three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-II)to help maintain the skin’s natural barrier.

[ 3 ESSENTIAL CERAMIDES ] Ceramides make up 50% of the lipids in the skin barrier. All CeraVe products are formulated with three essential ceramides (1; 3; 6-II)to help maintain the skin’s natural barrier. FSA Eligible & HSA Eligible
body.description: Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe Acne Foaming Cream Cleanser contains 4% Benzoyl Peroxide to help acne and prevent new flare-ups from forming. This daily acne face wash works to cleanse the skin, treat active breakouts, and maintain the skin's barrier. This unique formula has a transforming texture that dispenses as a cream and lathers into a rich foam.•Fragrance-free•Paraben-free•Non-comedogenic•Gentle, non-irritating formulaKey Ingredients:•4% Benzoyl Peroxide: Helps to clear and treat acne by cleansing skin’s surface of excess oil & impurities while penetrating deep into pores to treat active breakouts. Use daily to help clear skin of whiteheads, blackheads, cysts, pimples, and pustules.•Ceramides: Essential for healthy skin, ceramides help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier•Hyaluronic Acid: This ingredient attracts hydration to the skin’s surface and helps the skin retain moisture•Niacinamide: Helps calm the skin

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Product Features and Benefits Transforming Cream to Foam Texture Dispenses and applies as a soothing, creamy texture. Transforms into a deeply cleansing foam as you apply in gentle circular motions all over the face How to Use Wet skin with lukewarm water. Massage dime-size amount of Acne Foaming Cream Cleanser into skin in a gentle circular motion. Rinse. Excessive drying of the skin may occur. Start with one application daily, then gradually increase to two times daily if needed or as directed by a doctor If bothersome dryness or peeling occurs, reduce application to once a day or every other day If going outside, apply sunscreen after using this product. If irritation or sensitivity develops, stop use of both products or ask a doctor Suitable for Acne Prone Skin All CeraVe products are developed with dermatologists. Acne Foaming Cleanser is formulated without fragrance and is non-comedogenic. It is suitable for acne prone skin types 4% Benzoyl Peroxide, Hyaluronic Acid, Niacinamide, and Ceramides 4% Benzoyl Peroxide helps to clear and treat acne by cleansing skin's surface of excess oil & impurities while penetrating deep into pores to treat active breakouts. Clear skin of whiteheads, blackheads, cysts, pimples, and pustules. Hyaluronic Acid helps retain skin’s natural moisture. Niacinamide helps calm the skin. Ceramides are naturally found in your skin and play a vital role in helping your skin protect you. They help fill in the gaps between your skin cells so your skin can seal in moisture and seal out impurities.

CeraVe Acne Foaming Cream Cleanser CeraVe Resurfacing Retinol Serum CeraVe AM Facial Moisturizing Lotion with SPF 30 CeraVe PM Facial Moisturizing Lotion Use For: Facial Cleanser Resurfacing Serum Oil Free Face Moisturizer; Daily Sunscreen Oil Free Face Moisturizer Recommended Use: AM & PM AM and/or PM AM PM Key Benefits Cleanses to treat acne while allowing the skin to heal and maintaining the skin's barrier, leaving skin feeling comfortable Helps reduce the appearance of post acne marks and pores. Ceramides help to restore the skin's natural barrier. Moisturizes throughout the day. Helps restore the skin's protective barrier. Provides broad spectrum SPF 30 protection. Moisturizes throughout the night and helps restore the protective skin barrier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: loving this item - very soft on my skin and works wonderful with my other products

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Face Wash!!
reviews.reviewText: This is perfect for my wife's sensitive skin along with my oily/acne-prone skin. It's rare that we can share a face wash, but this one is great! There isn't an overly noticeable scent which is also nice. Will purchase again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fast shipping and just what we wanted
reviews.reviewText: Works perfect and has helped our daughters skin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Oily skin review
reviews.reviewText: I have oily skin and it’s usually more in the “T zone” area. I noticed that when I switched to this product It caused my skin to get more oily and it always looked as if I was sweating. Didnt really like that but it did help with getting rid of and maintaining my acne. Unfortunately it wasn’t the best under the chin/neck area but on my face it was great. Didn’t do much for my blackheads if anything at all I would find other products to do that for you if that’s part of your needs. My skin did look great tho but it’s didn’t feel smooth a little bumpy but it clears the acne well. Overall as an oily skin type person I think I’ll be switching back to the sa cleanser as it was more beneficial to me.NOTE: more towards the oily skin typePeople and at the end of the day this is my review. Never know what might not work for me May work for you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good cleanser that doesn’t dry your face
reviews.reviewText: It’s gentle, but cleanses well. Many cleansers can strip your face and leave it too dry. This is good at not removing all the moisture in your skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2021
reviews.reviewText: First off, I want to say this stuff is amazing and absolutely works (for me atleast)! I purchased this because I was struggling with really bad acne breakouts around where my mask sits on my face. My skin is super sensitive and has had a real hard time adjusting to wearing a mask for hours on end (#teacherlife). Second thing I have to say about this product is, I do not use this every day or all over my face. I tend to use this as a spot treatment and only wash the problem areas once or twice a week-usually in the evenings. When I tried using it more than 1-2 times a week it did start to dry out my face, so keep that in mind. When I use it the next morning I can see a remarkable difference in the acne and the condition of the skin in that area as well. Usually a big reduction in the redness and a shrinkage of the acne spots that are there. Any ance the was forming under the skin has been reduced as well.WARNING! This stuff will bleach your clothes, towels, and/or washcloths. I haven't ruined any clothes yet, but I have definitely accidentally bleached a couple of my towels and washcloths because I didn't rinse it off as well as I thought I did. So be sure to rinse really, really well. To be fair though, I did expect that to happen at some point because of the Benzoyl Peroxide. I just make sure to rinse well and wear older clothing I don't mind bleaching by accident. Same thing with the towel and washcloths.Overall, it's an awesome product and I would recommend it to anyone who is struggling with acne or is wanting to help clear up some problem areas without over drying the skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing for acne!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve purchased CeraVe’s Acne Fighting Cream Cleanser with Benzoyl Perixide several times for myself & my teenage Son. I have acne prone skin I have under control but at times blackheads begin to appear on my nose. One night of applying this cleanser the next morning they’re barely visible! My Son has battled acne more widespread. This has been a heaven sent for him. He cleanses his face morning & night with this & it has made a HUGE difference with his acne.There’s not much battling anymore period. What was widespread is now minimal. The benzoyl peroxide truly kills any acne forming or acne that has formed on his face. His face is clearer now with little new acne forming. I knew this was a strong cleanser so we slowly introduced it to his skin. He has fairly sensitive skin so we began with once a day. Moisturizing right after is a DEFINITE! This tightens up your face which is then in need of a good moisturizer. CeraVe has 2 great moisturizers to combine with this cleanser. There is little scent to it. It comes out more watery vs. other cleansers. I/we let it sit for about 1 minute to let it truly to its job. Since this is a harsher facial ingredient I never mix it with a retinol. The 2 will create extreme dryness with irritation. I learned the hard way. A gentle moisturizer is best to use only after using this. I will use it at night only because I have a skin regime in the morning which wouldn’t allow me to use this. What I love about CeraVe’s product line is they come with the 3 essential ceramides, hyaluronic acid & niacinamide~2 wonderful ingredients for our skin. If you’re battling acne this cleanser is definitely worth purchasing. Be aware this will leave markings on colored wash cloths & towels~ due to the benzoyl peroxide. For all this offers the price is really amazing because this 5 ounce tube/bottle does have longevity to it because you don’t need much to cover your face. This doesn’t foam up. With a little water it’s more like a layer you apply to your skin. I see it more as a treatment for a female. This will not remove makeup ladies. I use CeraVe’s Hydrating Micellar Water to cleanse my face before using this. For my Son he can get away with just using this to cleanse his face. We both have gentle silicone scrubbers to help work it into our skin. I hope my personal experience helps you decide if this is for you. A trusting name with a specific purpose. It’s worth the buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Scentless, good texture, decent amount for the price
reviews.reviewText: If you've tried other benzoyl peroxide cleansers/washes, this will probably be the best one you'll find. It is scentless unlike a lot of the panoxyl and panoxyl-clone types. It does lather a very little bit which can feel a bit nicer on the skin than some of the other non-lathering type cleansers. Importantly, does not have that chalky feel of some other benzoyl peroxide cleansers.Overall, meets the expectations you have of cerave products if you have enjoyed others from them.Works well on face as well as body. I would recommend a 4% formula like this over those high-strength 10% formulations. AFAIK and from studies/doctor recos I've seen, 10% benzoyl is NOT more effective than 4% at treating acne. 10% will be more drying and irritating for no reason.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love it . It made my skin glow.
After 4weeks of usage. My hormonal acne on my jawline and neck has been gone.. all the redness and inflammation were slowly stopped from reoccurring.

I originally got this for my now 19 year old. It cleared his skin within three months. He used this wash, the stridex wipes and then the CeraVe moisturiser ever day and night. As we live in Australia during the day he swapped the moisturiser for one with sun screen.He now uses the oily skin wash. As he is now in the Australian Army, Amazon makes it easy to send the packages straight to him with face wash etc.I now have my daughter on this she doesn’t have acne but those small bumps and as she wears make up this stuff is fantastic. She takes the make up off first (always double cleanse) then uses this wash, the stridex wipes and a CeraVe her skin is glowing
Product was very watery . No lather and not foamy at all. The product wasn’t supposed to be so watery.
The product that i should have known earlier!Big Thanks to Cerave!
